original_title: A Few Tales of Hard Times: Chapter 4 - The Name
overview: Based on the spaghetti westerns of the 70's and Film Noir of the 50's but set in today's times, Virgil is a gun for hire for the mysterious Boss. He visits The Man to collect information for The Boss that only 3 men have. The first 2 are dead.
title: A Few Tales of Hard Times: Chapter 4 - The Name
